thread.title: Harapan, Bersatu send memo to protest Trump's 'Muslim ban'
thread.title_full: Harapan, Bersatu send memo to protest Trump's 'Muslim ban'

title: Harapan, Bersatu send memo to protest Trump's 'Muslim ban'
text:
More 
Pakatan Harapan and Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) submitted a joint memorandum to the US Embassy today to demand the retraction of the US immigration travel ban. 
The travel ban implemented by President Donald Trump on the citizens of seven Muslim-majority countries is now referred to as the "Muslim ban". 
"This executive order, a form of blanket discrimination, is mean-spirited, divisive, inhumane and a breach of human rights," the two parties said. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
